comments.author: Matt
comments.body: Sorry to bail on the ride today. I rode back-to-back hard rides (Jamestown/Ward & Walker Ranch) the past two days. By the time I got to Gregory Canyon my knees informed me that I needed a day off. I hope your ride went well!

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Jeez, the only thing I hate more than having MB right on my tail is _thinking_ he's right on my tail. I thought I was a scant switchback ahead of him the whole way up, only to discover he was back on campus (galivanting, no doubt). Sheesh.
